trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s feet transform into golden hooves\, and (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e raises one up high and stomps down upon you\, knocking the wind out of your lungs\.$
trigger.name: stag_stagstomp1__

trigger.match: ^The form of a ghostly stag settles upon ([A-Z][a-z]+)\. (?:H|Sh)e raises one golden hoof up high and stomps down upon you\, knocking the wind out of your lungs\.$
trigger.name: stag_stagstomp2__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) (arm|leg) is crushed under the fierce stomping\!$
trigger.name: stag_stagstomp_break__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) tilts [hH](?:is|er) head back and bellows at you\, forcing you to cover your ears\.$
trigger.name: stag_bellow__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) lowers [hH](?:is|er) head and charges you\, slamming into your body\.$
trigger.name: stag_headbutt__

trigger.match: ^You are hurled (\w+)wards by the force of the blow\.$
trigger.name: stag_headbutted__

trigger.match: ^Powerful spirits plague you with their terrible presence\.$
trigger.name: stag_ancestralcurse__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) lowers ([hH]is|[hH]er) head and charges you\, goring you with \2 antlers\.$
trigger.name: stag_gore_pain__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) lowers ([hH]is|[hH]er) head and charges you\, impaling you on \2 antlers\.$
trigger.name: stag_gore_impale__

trigger.match: ^Your health continues to drain away as your impaled body shudders on the end of [A-Z][a-z]+\'s antlers\.$
trigger.name: stag_gore_impaled__
